subject: Sales
title: The Right Question Changes Everything
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: The Right Question Changes Everything.

hook.text: A doctor asks 'Where does it hurt?' and finds the real problem. A great seller does the same thing.

buildup.text: Smart questions uncover needs, build rapport, and guide conversations toward natural conclusions.

discovery.text: The right question doesn't just gather data. It makes the buyer rethink their own situation entirely.

twist.text: Most sellers ask questions to confirm their pitch. Great sellers ask questions that challenge assumptions.

climax.text: Master questioning and you'll never need a hard close. The answers lead the buyer there naturally.

punchline.text: Ask the right question and the sale finds itself.

quiz.question: How do great sellers use questions differently?
options: They challenge assumptions instead of confirming their pitch
